Package ohos.bluetooth.ble

Class GattCharacteristic

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.bluetooth.ble.GattCharacteristic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sequenceable

    public class GattCharacteristic
extends Object
implements Sequenceable
    Represents the Bluetooth GATT characteristic.

    The GATT characteristic is a basic data element for constructing a GATT service. The characteristic contains a value, additional information, and optional GATT descriptors.

    Since:
    1

      Indicates that the characteristic can be written with no response.
